#include <stdio.h>#include <stdlib.h>#include "SqStack.h"void workA() //ç‰¹åˆ¤A{    printf("sae");}void workB() //ç‰¹åˆ¤B{    printf("tsaedsae");}void work_(linkStack* S,LinkQueue* Q) {    char temp;    LinkStack S1;    InitStack(&S1);    while (PoP(S, &temp)) {        if (temp == ')') {            work_(S,Q);        }        else if (temp != '(') {            //PoP(&S, &temp);            Push(&S1, temp);        }        else {            char head;            if (PoP(&S1, &head)) {                EnQueue(Q, head);                while (PoP(&S1, &temp)) {                    EnQueue(Q, temp);                    EnQueue(Q, head);                }            }            else {                while (DeQueue(Q, &temp)) {                    Push(&S1, temp);                }                PoP(&S1, &head);                EnQueue(Q, head);                while (PoP(&S1, &temp)) {                    EnQueue(Q, temp);                    EnQueue(Q, head);                }            }            break;        }    }}int main() {    char tmp;    char str[10000];    int len = 0;    LinkStack S;    InitStack(&S);    LinkStack ans;    InitStack(&ans);    printf("è¯·è¾“å…¥é­”ç‹çš„è¯­è¨€#ç»“æŸï¼š");    while ((tmp = getchar()) != '#') //è¾“å…¥#ç»“æŸ    {        str[len] = tmp;        len++;    }    for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {        Push(&S, str[i]);    }    while (PoP(&S, &tmp)) {        if (tmp == ')') {            LinkQueue Q;            InitQueue(&Q);            work_(&S,&Q);            while (DeQueue(&Q, &tmp)) {                Push(&ans, tmp);            }        }        else {            Push(&ans, tmp);        }    }    char sb;    while (PoP(&ans, &sb)) {        printf("%c", sb);    }    return 0;}

//é‡è½½charæ•°ç»„å¼ºåˆ¶ç±»å‹è½¬æ¢};vector<int> buma(BigNum t1) //å°†ä¸€ä¸ªå¤§æ•°è½¬æ¢ä¸ºvectorå½¢å¼çš„äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ•°{    vector<int> x;    while (t1 >= 1) {        x.push_back(t1 % 2);        t1 /= 2;    }    if (t1.f == false) {        for (int i = 0; i < x.size(); i++) {            x[i] = 1 - x[i];        }        x[0]++;        for (int i = 0; i < x.size() - 1; i++) {            if (x[i] > 1) {                x[i] = 0;                x[i + 1]++;            }        }        if (x[x.size()-1] > 1) {            x[x.size()-1] = 0;            x.push_back(1);        }    }    if (t1.f == false) {        x.push_back(1);    }    else {        x.push_back(0);    }    return x;}BigNum::BigNum(const int b) //å°†ä¸€ä¸ªintç±»å‹çš„å˜é‡è½¬åŒ–æˆå¤§æ•°{    int c, d = b;    len = 0;    if (b < 0) {        f = 0;        d = abs(b);    }    while (d > 9) {        c = d - (d / 10) * 10; i --)    {        t = 0;        k = i;        t = t * 10 + s[i] - '0';        a.push_back(t);    }}BigNum::BigNum(const string s) //å°†ä¸€ä¸ªstringç±»å‹çš„å˜é‡è½¬åŒ–ä¸ºå¤§æ•°{    a.clear();    int t, k, L, i; i--)    {        t = 0;        k = i;        t = t * 10 + s[i] - '0';        a.push_back(t);    }}BigNum::BigNum(const vector<int>v) //å°†ä¸€ä¸ªvectorç±»å‹çš„å˜é‡è½¬åŒ–ä¸ºå¤§æ•°{    len = v.size();    for (int i = len - 1;
